Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add RatingSlideView with RatingFooterButton component

Create RatingSlideView:
- New slide type for rating experiences
- Uses AnyRegularContentView for main content (title, subtitle, media)
- Includes continue button at bottom
- Add .rating case to OnbSlideType with all standard content parameters
- Wire up RatingSlideView in AnyOnboardingSlideView
- Add preview with 3 rating examples

Create RatingFooterButton component:
- HStack with 5 rating buttons (1-5)
- OnbRatingButtonOption enum with .number and .thumbs modes
- Number mode: displays "1", "2", "3", "4", "5"
- Thumbs mode: displays "👎", "👎", "🤷", "👍", "👍"
- Thumbs mode scales ratings 1 and 5 by 1.3x for emphasis
- Each button uses onbButtonStyle with cornerRadius: 0
- Entire stack has customizable cornerRadius (default: 32)
- Inject buttonStyle: OnbButtonStyleType for consistent styling
- Inject font (default: .title.weight(.medium))
- Default vertical padding: 16
- State management with selectedRating: Int? and onTap callback
- Visual feedback with isSelected states

Add RatingFooterLabels feature:
- Optional labels struct with leadingLabel and trailingLabel
- OnbRatingLabelPlacement enum with .top and .bottom options
- Customizable labelFont and labelColor
- Labels display with horizontal padding: 16
- Labels positioned above or below buttons based on placement
- VStack spacing between labels and buttons: 4

Preview demonstrates:
- Number rating without labels
- Thumbs rating without labels
- Number rating with labels on top ("Poor" / "Excellent")
- Thumbs rating with labels on bottom ("Disagree" / "Agree")
- All examples with interactive state management
